listitem.simpara: The dependencies of the univention-corporate-client package have been updated: Network Manager was added (Bug 30297).
The original LSB values from Kubuntu are now retained. This fixes the compatibility with packages/services depending on specific values (Bug 32627).

Patches applied to UCC 1.0 were migrated to UCC 2.0 (if applicable) (Bug 33760, Bug 33760). The UCS packages imported in UCC were updated to the versions in UCS 3.2-1. Among other improvements this allows blacklisting kernel modules using the &ucsUCRV; kernel/blacklist (Bug 30177).

section.title: Image rollouts, software and image updates

listitem.simpara: /etc/ldap.secret was added to the list of persistent files (Bug 30463). Also add symlink support to univention-ucc-sync-persistent-files.
An update run of univention-ucc-software-update can now be forced with the new option --force (Bug 32296).
Clarify error message in case an image could not be found (Bug 30994).
rdate has been added to the dependencies of univention-ucc-join. This ensures that the system time is synchronised correctly (Bug 34869).
An additional boot option 'local boot' is available, which tells the client's PXE environment to exit and resume the normal boot order. (Bug 32114).
Added DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive to univention-ucc-software-update (Bug 31010).

A new tool (ucc-image-add-citrix-receiver) has been created which integrates the Citrix Receiver into a UCC image; the necessary dependencies are installed and the Receiver installed afterwards. It is part of ucc-image-toolkit. (Bug 34452).

listitem.para:
Several improvements and bugfixes were made to ucc-image
Display the progress when uncompressing UCC images (Bug 33933).
Use the same base multiplier when calculating the image size as the initramfs (Bug 30063).
Create all files in the workingdir and move them at the end (Bug 31634).
Handle the targetdir option correctly (Bug 31634).
Increase logfile readability by logging executed commands (Bug 31634).
Always install base ucc packages (Bug 31634).
Write compression progress to stdout (Bug 31634).
To reduce the required image size during image creation the system is now installed in an directory not into the image. Then the installed system is copied into the image (Bug 31942).
Temporarily set the nameserver during image build. This fixes build errors on UCS member servers(Bug 30286).

listitem.simpara: The new package univention-ucc-bootstrap ships dummy init scripts for systemd-logind, modemmanager, whoopsie and ofono. These packages ship Upstart jobs, but no SysV init scripts (which are needed during image creation in chroots) (Bug 33782).
Start the loopback interface on system boot which improves boot times when the LDAP server is unreachable (Bug 30441).
A new package univention-ucc-bootstrap was added. It contains stub sysv init scripts to cope with startup failure of packages only shipping Upstart jobs (Bug 33782).
Do not backup old initramfs files (Bug 31015).
A superflous empty line at the beginnging of join scripts generated by ucc-image has been fixed (Bug 34746).
Only update grub if a new image was downloaded during an update check (Bug 30069).
Reset boot variant only if a new image was downloaded during an update check (Bug 34762).
Create new initramfs files in temporary directory (not in /boot) (Bug 31015).
The access permissions for the directory /ucc_root have been restricted (Bug 34671).
Improved get_boot_mount_option.sh error handling, it always outputs a sensible boot option (Bug 31683).
The apt source from which errata updates are installed has been updated for UCC 2.0 (Bug 31150).
Remove unused kernel packages before performing a software update (Bug 31012]).
Package source lists are no longer updated for each package that is to installed (Bug 32575).
Check for package existence before (un-)installing it (Bug 34124).
A typo in a status message during software updates has been fixed (Bug 34026).
Logging of software updates has been improved (Bug 34123).
Use /tmp or /ucc_root as the temporary directory (the directory with more free space is used) (Bug 31015).

listitem.para:
Several improvements were made to univention-ucc-software-update (Bug 31061)
Exit softwareupdate script when a reboot is necessary
Added additional messages during software update
Outdated &ucsUCR; templates for the KDE display manager have been removed (Bug 34512).

listitem.simpara: The plymouth bootsplash init scripts have been fixed to keep plymouth displaying during software updates and correctly display messages from the filesystem check (Bug 31126, Bug 30575).

listitem.para:
Several improvements were made to ucc-image-set-join-information
A password parameter has been added (Bug 31784).
The parameter handling has been fixed (Bug 30601).

listitem.simpara: The parsing of several initramfs parameters has been corrected (Bug 31367).
The initramfs parameter force_partition can be used to enforce repartition, without user interaction (Bug 30427).
Obsolte code has been removed from the listener module that creates the PXE configuration files for ucc clients on the ucs server (Bug 30347).
The join script 91ucc-pxe-boot.inst from ucc-pxe-boot now ensures that the default-settings policies/dhcp_boot policy exists (Bug 3561).

A &ucsUCR; Module has been added to immediately apply changes of the ucc/pxe/* variables to all existing PXE configuration files for ucc clients, e.g. setting ucc/pxe/loglevel changes the loglevel kernel parameter in all PXE configuration files (Bug 29904).
Old and unused kernel package are automatically removed from ucc clients with univention-ucc-prune-old-kernel-packages. Determination of the package status has been fixed in this script (Bug 32166).
The local buffer of free space on a ucc root-device for persistent data has been reduced to 10 MB (Bug 32311).

The new boot option partition_script for UCC clients has been added. This option defines a script to use for partitioning instead of the partitioning settings from the image. The script must be placed in the /var/lib/univention-client-boot/partition-scripts directory on all UCS UCC PXE servers (Bug 34612).
During the update to an UCC 2.0 image the &ucsUCRV; nameserver1 is automatically set to the new default 127.0.1.1 if the previous value was the UCC 1.0 default (Bug 34646).
The SSH host keys are now recreated during domain join. They are also tracked as persistent files (Bug 30163).
The determination of the kerberos key version number of the ucc host account during the join has been fixed (Bug 30471).
During the domain join the group and user database is now actualised before running the join scripts (Bug 30760).
The handling of the domain join password file during automated rollouts has been fixed (Bug 33802).
An unjoin script for univention-corporate-client-schema has been added, which unregisters all UCC images from LDAP (Bug 30852).

By default, univention-ucc-update-nss copies the nss user data from the UCS server only if the user is not already known. This test can be disabled by setting the &ucsUCRV; ucc/nss/update/force to true (Bug 31864).

The new mete packages univention-ucc-i18n-de, univention-ucc-i18n-en, univention-ucc-i18n-es, univention-ucc-i18n-fr and univention-ucc-i18n-nl install all dependencies needed for a localised Kubuntu desktop (Bug 34517).

The package language-pack-gnome-* has been added for all languages that are available by default (en, de, es, fr, nl). It adds internalisation for the "Power off" button in the LightDM login manager. Note that this package hasn't been added to the thin client image due to size constraints. It can be added to custom images (Bug 31807).
The bash-completion has been added in order to provide bash completion (Bug 30254).

Kernel updates on standard thin client image has been disabled by marking the package linux-image-generic as hold. If and what packages should be set to hold can be configured in the ucc image creation tool config file using the parameter packages_hold (Bug 34489).
The &ucsUCR; variable description of univention-lightdm has been improved (Bug 30933).
pam_mkhomedir was not executed under all circumstances, this has been fixed (Bug 34790).
The monolithic &ucsUCR; template for /etc/pam.d/lightdm has been split into a multifile template (Bug 31409).
The LXDE session can now also be forced (Bug 30420).

The new UCR variable lightdm/autologin/user allows the configuration of the user under which the automatic login should occur. If the variable is unset a temporary guest user is used as before (Bug 30617).
The univention-ucc-theme package now depends on libglib2.0-bin (Bug 30579).
A bug was fixed that deleted the LightDM PAM configuration during updates (Bug 32119).
The default umask for pam_mkhomedir has been changed to 0066 (Bug 31303).
A devilspie configuration was integrated into the XenApp session script. The Citrix session is now correctly running in fullscreen if the autologin is used (Bug 30358).
Implement a post session menu if XenApp is selected as the automatic session. It allows to restart the session, switch back to LightDM or shutdown the system (Bug 32043).
Add a new &ucsUCRV; citrix/accepteula. If set to true, a configuration file is added to the user's home which accepts the EULA of Citrix Receiver. (Bug 34452).
The handling of the &ucsUCRV;rdp/geometry has been fixed (Bug 31951).
The handling of the &ucsUCRV;rdp/additionaloptions has been fixed (Bug 31717).
A new boot variant option for repartitioning and initial rollout has been added. The checkbox for repartitioning has been removed (Bug 30466).
The description of the UCC image module has been fixed (Bug 32433).
UMC icons for UCC policy objects have been added (Bug 30366).
A simplified wizard for the creation of UCC computers has been added (Bug 32942).
A traceback when creating UCC computer objects has been fixed (Bug 34378).
Nagios support has been added for UCC computer objects (Bug 31276).
The MAC address of UCC computer objects is an required attribute now (Bug 34757).
univention-ucc-remote-mount is now disabled on desktop images (Bug 30552). ram* and loop* devices are now ignored (Bug 30468).

The udev handling for ATA CDROM devices in univention-ucc-remote-mount has been fixed. The udev script now tries to speed up ATA cdrom devices with the eject tool. Problems with changing CD/DVDs in a drive were fixed (Bug 31685, Bug 31713).
Obsolete tools and code has been removed from udev handling for CDROM devices Bug 31749).
The lightdm startup script for multimonitor setup has been fixed Bug 30402).
After connection timeouts to Cups server, a reconnect is now performed (Bug 30911).
univention-ucc-printerconfig now depends on cups-client (Bug 32515).
Add workarounds for grub2, kdm and lightdm to always install noninteractively (Bug 31035).
The logging on UCC clients is now using the RELP protocol instead of UDP. This ensures that logfiles are more complete (Bug 34863).
The &ucsUCR; template for the krb5.conf config file now also supports the dns_lookup_kdc option (Bug 32080).

Two new &ucsUCR; variables have been added to preconfigure proxy settings for Firefox and KDE: ucc/proxy/http configures the URL of the proxy server and ucc/proxy/autoconfig/url the URL of the proxy PAC (Bug 31905, Bug 32580)

The new package univention-ucc-cifshome-pam-mount installs a mechanism to automatically mount a CIFS share as home directory during user login. Server, share name and mount options may be defined via the &ucsUCR; variables ucc/mount/cifshome/server, ucc/mount/cifshome/share and ucc/mount/cifshome/options (Bug 32057).
The new &ucsUCRV; ucc/cups/server allows to configure Cups server(s) (Bug 32056).

The univention-ucc-italc package provides italc for Univention Corporate Client (Bug 30830). The package univention-ucc-ucsschool-integration installs all required packages for using UCC with UCS@school (Bug 30829, Bug 31902, Bug 31906, Bug 31976, Bug 31976,). More information can be found in the UCS@School user manual
Kernel modesetting has been disabled for the cirrus driver due to a problem initializing the framebuffer Bug 34448.
A traceback in ldap-passwd-to-file.py has been fixed Bug 32958.
A quoting bug in the grub.cfg subtemplate /etc/grub.d/15_ucc from the package univention-ucc-grub has been fixed Bug 32631.
